name: The Backbencher
description:
The Backbenchers

Being a nerd is not easy. You don't easily get accepted to the cool group of backbenchers. You have to prove yourself. The only way to do that is by impressing Darla!

Point and Click your way through 2 exams, answering wrongly when Darla is looking. But beware, if you answer too many worng, you might just end the exam abruptly.

There are 6 ways the game can end and I hope you get to see the best of them. I wish you all the best for the exams. 

--> Be sure to leave some loving in the comments, if you liked the game :)
